message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.EC, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the complexity of pricing problems in the context of mechanism design, which is a central topic in game theory (cs.GT). The problem of finding an optimal bundle-pricing involves combinatorial optimization and revenue maximization, which are typical topics in algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of simple pricing mechanisms, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and economics and computation (cs.EC). Finally, the paper involves information theory, as it considers the impact of the distribution of buyer valuations on the pricing problem (cs.IT).
